# FPS Game - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
A high-performance 3D first-person shooter (FPS) game running in the web browser using Three.js, TypeScript, and Vite.

## Tech Stack
- **Three.js** - 3D rendering engine
- **TypeScript** - Type-safe JavaScript
- **Vite** - Fast build tool and dev server

## Game Features
- First-person camera with mouse look
- WASD movement controls
- Shooting mechanics with weapons
- Basic AI enemies
- Collision detection
- Health/Ammo HUD
- Performance optimized for browsers

## Development Commands
- `npm install` - Install dependencies
- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production

## Project Structure
- `src/` - Source code
  - `main.ts` - Entry point
  - `game/` - Game logic
  - `entities/` - Player, enemies, projectiles
  - `weapons/` - Weapon system
  - `utils/` - Utility functions
- `public/` - Static assets
